Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 136th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2009...
Traded from Atlanta to Colorado on 2/12/2012 (Going to ATL: 3B M. Cabrera, C J. Mathis. Going to COL: C H. Cargo, P J. Nelson)...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/7/2013, off Aaron Laffey (KCA)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/15/2013, off Luke Gregerson (PHI)...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 6/15/2013...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2016...
Traded from Colorado to Pittsburgh on 6/30/2017 (Going to COL: CF R. Acosta, C J. Maldonado. Going to PIT: C H. Cargo, P I. West, P M. Boggs)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2018...
Signed as a free agent by Washington on 2/6/2019 to a 3-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Released by Washington on 9/7/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (N) on 2/1/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Released by Los Angeles (N) on 7/3/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 7/3/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/23/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
